title: Tork Motors launches electric motorcycle KRATOS, KRATOS-R
description: KRATOS is equipped with a 4kWh battery which has a range of 120 km and can accelerate (0-40 kmph) within 4 secs along with a maximum speed of 100 kmph, the company said in a statement.
